DOC.brief_title: Study Pimecrolimus Treatment Atopic Dermatitis African American Children
DOC.criteria: African American child age 2 17 year mild moderate atopic dermatitis mEASI le 3 baseline allergy Elidel component use oral steroid , immunosuppressive agent , cytostatics phototherapy within 4 week prior study . previous continuous noncontinuous use pimecrolimus tacrolimus great 11 month within 2 week enrollment . active skin infection . immunocompromised patient . previous history skin cancer lymphoma hypopigmentation study area pregnant breastfeed participation another investigational trial
